definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: We fought with them with grenade and sub-machine gun in the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 在叢林中，我們用手榴彈和輕機槍掙扎着。

sentences.english: All five-second grenade fuses will burn down in three seconds.
sentences.chinese: 所有用時五秒燒完的手榴彈引線都會在三秒內燒完。

sentences.english: A German grenade had taken three fingers off his left hand.
sentences.chinese: 德國人的手榴彈奪走了他左手的三根手指。

sentences.english: On March 11, Saudi Consulate in Karachi who have been attacked two grenades.
sentences.chinese: 本月11日，沙特駐卡拉奇領館曾遭兩枚手榴彈襲擊。

sentences.english: Rule7. All five-second grenade fuses will burn down in three seconds.
sentences.chinese: 第七，所有五秒的手榴彈引線都會在三秒內燒完。

sentences.english: The soldier looped a grenade into the enemy shelter trench.
sentences.chinese: 士兵將一枚手榴彈呈弧形拋進敵方掩蔽壕裏。

sentences.english: We had gathered magnolia seed pods for hand grenades;
sentences.chinese: 我們把木蘭花籽的莢果集攏起來，當手榴彈用。

sentences.english: The original gowardesh used his quick wits to use grenades fry an export.

sentences.english: Unknown people threw hand-grenades into the house of a contractor.
sentences.chinese: 原因是未透露姓名的人投擲手榴彈引起爆炸。

sentences.english: BZ was eventually put in hand grenades and a 750 pound cluster bomb.
sentences.chinese: BZ最終被放進手榴彈和750磅的集束炸彈中。

sentences.english: In each case the hijackers bluffed the crew using fake grenades.
sentences.chinese: 每一個案例中，劫機者都用了假手榴彈嚇唬機組人員。

sentences.english: All five-second grenade fuses will burn down in three second.
sentences.chinese: 所有號稱可燃燒5秒的手榴彈引線都會在3秒內燒完。

sentences.english: Pig bring you hand grenades are sinking.
sentences.chinese: 八戒把你那顆手榴彈拿來。

sentences.english: Stick bombs hung handle down from their belts.
sentences.chinese: 手榴彈倒掛在每人的束身皮帶上，彈柄朝下。
